title: Rambo: first blood. Part II (Captioned)
creator_credit: Tri-Star Pictures, Buzz Feitshans and George Pan Cosmatos
brief_description: He’s on a mission and that’s just where he belongs! He’s told not to engage the enemy. “Just take pictures”, they say. But telling Rambo to hold back is like ordering a rattle-snake not to bite. Rambo’s dropped into the Vietnam jungle to find out if there are still any POW’s about. There are. And now Rambo’s going to get them home - on his own! Caption version only available. Rated: M
